attributes.action: sack the archbishop of canterbury dr rowan williams.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Obviously this man is suffering from a bad case of dementia or similar. Who in gods name should want any form of sharia law in the united kingdom of great britain. This is our country. OURS.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
